half_double_crochet and slip_stitch should increase half_double_crochet by 1 and slip_stitch by 1 abbreviations chain = chain half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet ● yarn over insert hook into the back loop only of the half_double_crochet stitch s third loop slip_stitch = slip_stitch ● insert hook into the stitch yarn over pull through to draw up a loop and pull the yarn through the yarn on the
